caption: Oh wow! It taste so homemade I thought my mom was in the Kitchen.  I ordered the Grio with fried plantain, side salad, pikliz, sauce all for $12 bucks.  Mom got the legume with white rice.  She gave it a thumbs up.  No posted menu, just a daily verbal menu of the daily catch. Clean, fast and, good service.  Will definitely be coming back to this hidden haitian gem.

I have eaten here a couple times and the food is probably the closest thing you can get to back home. The people there are polite and serve very fast. And most important of all, they have the cheapest price of all Haitian restaurants I have been in Brooklyn.
